description:
Speaker: Alexey Grigorev

Track:PyData
We present a duplicate detection system that we use to fight fraud in online classifieds. The system uses machine learning to analyze both text and images of 10 million ads daily and stop fraudulent listings before they do any harm.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/7PHMWA
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Fighting fraud: finding duplicates at scale
